channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Launching our first OpenAI Certifications courses
item.description: Learn how OpenAI’s new certifications and AI Foundations courses help people build real-world AI skills, boost career opportunities, and prepare for the future of work. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-certificate-courses

item.title: Bringing powerful AI to millions across Europe with Deutsche Telekom
item.description: OpenAI is collaborating with Deutsche Telekom to bring advanced, multilingual AI experiences to millions of people across Europe. ChatGPT Enterprise will also be deployed to help employees at Deutsche Telekom improve workflows and accelerate innovation. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/deutsche-telekom-collaboration

item.title: Instacart and OpenAI partner on AI shopping experiences
item.description: OpenAI and Instacart are deepening their longstanding partnership by bringing the first fully integrated grocery shopping and Instant Checkout payment app to ChatGPT. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/instacart-partnership

item.title: The state of enterprise AI
item.description: Key findings from OpenAI’s enterprise data show accelerating AI adoption, deeper integration, and measurable productivity gains across industries in 2025. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/the-state-of-enterprise-ai-2025-report

item.title: How confessions can keep language models honest
item.description: OpenAI researchers are testing “confessions,” a method that trains models to admit when they make mistakes or act undesirably, helping improve AI honesty, transparency, and trust in model outputs. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/how-confessions-can-keep-language-models-honest

item.title: OpenAI to acquire Neptune
item.description: OpenAI is acquiring Neptune to deepen visibility into model behavior and strengthen the tools researchers use to track experiments and monitor training. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-to-acquire-neptune

item.title: Announcing the initial People-First AI Fund grantees
item.description: The OpenAI Foundation announces the initial recipients of the People-First AI Fund, awarding $40.5M in unrestricted grants to 208 nonprofits supporting community innovation and opportunity. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/people-first-ai-fund-grantees
